title: 5 Tips for Safer Intercity Travel in Nigeria (2026)
excerpt: Night travel can be risky. Here is how to choose the safest bus companies and seats.
content:
Traveling by road in Nigeria requires smart planning. Here are the best ways to stay safe.

1. Choose the Right Company

We recommend using companies with vehicle tracking like GIGM or GUO Transport.

2. Avoid Night Travel

While night buses are cheaper, they are significantly riskier. Always try to book the first bus (6:00 AM - 7:00 AM).
